metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0236 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
libvirt before 1.2.12 allow remote authenticated users to obtain the VNC password by using the VIR_DOMAIN_XML_SECURE flag with a crafted (1) snapshot to the virDomainSnapshotGetXMLDesc interface or (2) image to the virDomainSaveImageGetXMLDesc interface.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0236` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirt-bin - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.16
libvirt0 - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvirt package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.16').
